mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_MAIL, MEM_HP, MEM_ROLE , MEM_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{noname} AND MEM_DELETE IS NULL

WITH V_PROD AS ( SELECT PROD.* , LPROD.* , BUYER.* FROM PROD INNER JOIN LPROD ON (PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) INNER JOIN BUYER ON (PROD_BUYER = BUYER_ID) ), V_CART AS( SELECT CART.* , TO_DATE( SUBSTR(CART_NO, 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD' ) AS CART_DATE , PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU , LPROD_ID, LPROD_GU, LPROD_NM , BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME FROM CART INNER JOIN V_PROD ON (CART_PROD = PROD_ID) ) SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1 , MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1 , MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL , MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE , MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE , MEM_DELETE, MEM_ROLE , MEM_IMG , V_CART.* FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN V_CART on (MEM_ID = CART_MEMBER) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1 , MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1 , MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL , MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE , MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE , MEM_DELETE, MEM_ROLE FROM MEMBER
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DELETE = 'Y' WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
